title: cant believe markiplier did this to me

comments.comment:
pewdiepie: uploads in japan time 
Australians: very nice
Felix looks so different, he radiates the happiness and relief all around him, it makes me happy seeing him like this.

I don’t understand why some people don’t like that Felix moved to Japan - he’s always been interested in the culture in a respectful and genuine way. And we can see that him and Marzia really wanted this. So what if they took a private jet? They can afford it and they did it for the health of their pets, not to flaunt their money. Anyone would do the same if they could.

Been with Felix since Amnesia days. And Felix and Marzia are the most wholesome down to earth people I've ever watched on YouTube. They deserve all the things that they've done for themselves and their doggy babies

Yes many Japanese feel so proud to have you here! Many younger Japanese people don't understand why non-Japanese think Japan is so cool or unique country. But I think when they read about you and why you move to Japan, it help them to understand why their own country and culture appeal to many people abroad! Thank you for sharing your interest of Japan with so many people!!
I definitely cried when Pewds' genuine smile and teary eyes were in that video. So happy for you and Marzia!

Even though I've been on-off watching pewds since I was 13, now I'm 21 and about to graduate college, it's crazy to think that an entire generation grew up with pewds and seeing him finally make his dream come true is enough to make all of us cry
Felix seems super happy now that he’s moved. He seems relaxed and he even gives off that type of energy. Happy for you, Pewds!
Leave it to pewds to build his first magic deck around a card that literally says “you can’t win the game and your opponents can’t lose the game”
I'd really love to see PewDiePie and Abroad in Japan together in one video.

Honestly seeing him achieve his dreams and be at peace just motivates me that it’s not impossible to be happy, it’s simple things really. Pewds is so genuine and honest, that’s why I love watching him. Atleast he took a private for an actual reason like Maya, anyone in his place would so I don’t get what people are bitching about

smol brain: Pewdiepie won't last 6 months, it'll get too hot
big brain: Pewdiepie won't last a week, the appliances self-cleaning will scare him away
It’s honestly kinda disrespectful how people are saying he’ll stay for 6 months and leave, he’s clearly very happy and living his dream and I’m very happy for him and marzia

The whole idea of a seperate channel for gaming sounds so nice. The elden ring video was amazing, id  love to see more videos like that. Tbh just seeing felix do what he likes  makes me happy at this point.
I love how PewDiePie looks 10 years younger instantly after moving to Japan.
I need that irl content in Japan

10:40
Seeing a PewDiePie Letsplay again would be a Blessing come true. It's been a long time since Pewds actually played a game. His Minecraft Series is one of my favorites.
This new upload time is perfect for UK since it’s right when everyone wakes up

I’m the guy at the end that lost 131Ib’s. I love you PewDiePie. Thank you for your kind words and the fact that it was such a big transformation that you weren’t even sure if it was real is honestly the biggest compliment I have ever received. Thank you and have a GREAT MF DAYYYYY
I still can't believe PEWDIEPIEさん is in Japan. I am very happy. うれしい!! 🇯🇵
Have a great time in Japan dude. Try not to intimidate any Katanas with your jawline.

I'm glad he did this video and not bothering people in Japan lol
I can tell he doesn't want to be know as "That foreigner who films everywhere he goes"
He looks and sounds so much happier I love this and I’m so glad he followed his heart and moved to Japan even though there were so many difficult steps. Proud of you, Felix:)

“My toilet is cleaning itself”

Well, as someone who doesn’t have toilets which cleans themselves, that sentence made me laugh.

There is so much nostalgia in this video and the happiness pewds and marzia for getting to japan damn near makes me wanna cry. Happy for you pewds. It's been about 11 years since I became a bro. Happy to be a part of such an awesome community. Love yall

i like how he starts second video in a row with "i'm in Japan" and i'm sooo happy for him :)
and also "i swear i'm in Japan" at the end lol
I really wanted to see Mark’s reaction on this low key they’ll always support each other
when you were in italy and tried out different snacks, that was such a cool and fun video. i'd love to see something like that but with japanese snacks! congrats again on the move!

God I hate that some people still claim Felix bought his way into Japan after he just went through a 3 year long bureaucratic nightmare.
Anyway, he comes off so positive in this video! I'm really happy that he can finally enjoy his stay and can leave the struggle behind!

I’m so happy that you have been finally able to move to Japan!
As a Japanese person, I feel honored to see someone like you loves Japan and shows a deep respect for the country 
I want to let you know that we’re so happy to have you here
Ah yes, 10-15 minutes of just chilling with Pewds. The kind of content I will always enjoy.
Shit in the shower guy finally made it to Japan. I am so happy for you. Keep up Bro

Felix looks so relaxed now. 
I'm happy for him that he finally moved
"If you're rich, you can still buy your way in" as if Felix didn't had to wait almost 3 years to be able to move lol

it’s been such a journey watching you these past years. from confusion over what’s going on during the first stages of the move, to finally understanding what’s going on, to being confused again over why you’re not going, to being frustrated with you, and of course loving every video along the way. i’ve never been happier for someone i’ve never met I hope you and marzia love japan
The episodic gameplay series are what I miss the most about "old" YouTube. I think what I liked most was just having the daily video to watch whenever I got home from school.

Its been almost 11 years since I found this channel and back then I would never expect you to grow this much. For me you were just some odd guy playing videogames which helped me through school. It was always fun to sit there after school and watching you screaming while playing Amnesia, Happy wheels or other stuff like skate, the walking dead and most of the horror genre.
I bet your past self would never expect you to be where you are now and is proud about what you've become. I wish you the best of luck in Japan Felix and I hope you will find peace and happiness there.
You genuinely can hear how much happier he is when he speaks.

It's so lovely seeing how happy and bright Felix is right now. It's just so wholesome and he is radiating his happiness. I mean I've always watched him because his energy is infectious and I feel his content now is just going to provide so much joy. Also his pugs remind me of mine. God bless Felix <3

Pewds: "I have 'disaster brain', where I constantly repeat the worst case scenario is going to happen."

Seeing as how the poor guy always has a massive spotlight on him, I'd be amazed if he didn't think like that.

I'm so happy for Felix, I've been watching him since I was 12 years old (22yo) and I can't help but be glad for all the things he's overcome/acquired.
I cried at his wedding (never thought that would happen) and now he's finally in Japan, making the content he wants. I'm just happy for him, and wish him the best! xx

Seeing you make the big move to Japan was the most wholesome thing ever and it made my day. Been watching you like 8 years and I’m 20. So in a way I kinda grew up watching you, probably a lot of us did. Seeing the man that entertained us for so long being happy makes us happy.
I'm glad they're still friends, it would be cool if there was a vid with Pewds, Sean and Mark like the old days
Pewds, as a dog lover, I think it's sweet you took a friggin jet to Japan for the sake of your pups health.
Best thing about watching Pewds as a 32yo is that I get to forget about life for 15-20 minutes. Cos it’s guaranteed that it won’t be a heavy subject, it’s always light hearted.

As a 33yr male that has literally never interacted with you, fuck the haters. I cried happy tears for you when you posted the video where you actually made it to Japan because it’s so rare to see someone commit to their dreams and persevere through all the hardships and have it all in the end. People are just jealous. You do what makes you happy and congrats on achieving your goals!
I feel after all these years that the reason Pewds is so successful is his ability to communicate and understand anybody.
Really happy for them! Every time I see Maya I tear up though, she's so cute and old and really reminds me of my good old pug who I had to let go three years ago.

Pewds: *Shows Japanese magic cards *
Magic community: "SEE? SEEE??? IT'S COOL AND RELEVANT!!!"

Haven't watched you in years, saw this pop up in my feed, decided to give it a watch. I will admit, seeing Maya as an old pug lady hit me harder than I thought it would.

Glad you're doing well, Stay awesome!
felix could literally sit and stare at the camera for an hour and I’d still be entertained lol

I feel like this moving event is very similar to how we reacted to their wedding.  We all are just happy that what we were hoping for for pewds finally happened. It's nice to see people youve spent so much time with and grown with achieve  their wants and goals.

So happy to see you happy Felix... Don't give a shit about what anyone says, follow your dreams and instincts. Thank you for being with me, been here since 35 mill subscribers. 
Thank you Felix.

I cant believe people are mad abt felix moving to japan. Ever since he mentioned that he wanted to move ive always been excited and supportive of him moving, i dont really know why i was so supportive of that, maybe its because he seemed so happy talking about it and also there was nothing really holding him back from making the move, hes happy so we should be happy for him aswell.

I totally get what Felix said about “disaster brain”!! I’m the same way, and even if things go to plan, it still takes a huge toll mentally because you’re constantly expecting the worst and being paranoid about it. I’m so glad everything went well for you guys and I could definitely see the relief on your face lol

I just hate all of those people on the internet that treat Japan like an immaculate place that must be kept sacred and safe from “outsiders”, like dude you bought a $25 katana and put it on a shelf that doesn’t make you Japanese and mean you know absolutely everything about Japan, or an exception to be able to go just cause you like anime. Felix has spent so much time, money, and energy to make this move possible and to learn the language and I’m glad for him. Imagine gatekeeping a culture that you aren’t even apart of, as It always seems that the gatekeepers aren’t part of the community themselves and are just annoying people who are against an issue that doesn’t even exist.
0:22 that my bros, even if it hasn't been that long, is pure nostalgia
12:17 Of course people care about you, you shaped our entire childhood lol. And you being such a good role model played a role in a lot of your viewers characters as well.

i was speaking to a friend in my bus and i mentioned that you’d made the move to japan and we were both like “i’m so happy for him, he finally made the move” it was a wholesome bro moment. we’re all so happy for you pewds
I’m so happy for them moving to japan, Felix just looks so much happier & thats all I could ever want honestly! I love you guys!!<3
Welcome to Japan Felix! Literally every Japanese who “knows” you is really happy that you successfully and safely made it to Japan:))
You can tell he's loving Japan , he mentioned it in almost every thing he said (:

Pewds, I've been watching since 2011, I'm 24. You have been a huge part of my life and seeing you succeed genuinely makes me very happy. It's funny that someone can play such a role in someone's life and they not even know that person exists you know?
7:21 has meme potential

I am really happy to see Felix smiling again. You can really see that pressure lift from his soul bless him. Moving is hard enough. Moving to another country is harder and moving during and post pandemic just the worst.

You know there comes a time where we all should appreciate how much of an inspiration PewDiePie has been since the beginning. This man finally gets to go to the place he has beet waiting for making it truly feel like he can now start a new era of posting videos. We are all proud of you Felix glad to see you where you can start happy.
Pewds, you’ve been doing this 12 years. I’m 24. I’ve been watching you for literally half of my life. Genuinely happy for you!
1:30 in Poland should be Lewandowski

I've seen you go through different kind of hells this 12 years, man. Those who criticize your wealth or just speak through envy haven't considered how hard you've worked for it and the awful experiences you've been through just because of youtube fame. I absolutely respect your mindset, your attitude and consider you a role model in many ways, so I'm really happy to see how you achieved a long term dream and most of your previous stress is gone. Enjoy Japan bro, you deserve it.
As someone who also lives in the eastern hemisphere, I'm glad I can finally watch Pewds vids as soon as they're uploaded in the day rather than the night.
I'd love to see Felix start doing more letsplays. It reminds me of when I'd watch my older brother play games as a kid.
Lots of love to Maya, adorable even after all these years.

We understand. Post what you want. Not what others want. People like it when you genuinely enjoy yourself. That’s what fridays with PewDiePie was all about.

Living learning and growing up was always the plan. Now we just gotta do it in our own way.
The episodic gameplay series are what I miss the most about “old” YouTube. I think what I liked most was just having the daily video to watch whenever I got home from school.

I genuinely feel so happy for you and marzia finally moving to Japan. And we can all see your sincere respect for the country. You are the most down to earth youtuber and I can see how happy you really are. Thank you for sharing your experience with us!!

Can we talk about how as an audience we are all grown up since 2012 and went from kids just commenting funny things to now being a full blown supportive community? I was 12 when i started watching him and now im a 22 yr old happy for a men i've never met
it's really nice to see how happy felix is, now that he and marzia have finally been able to move to japan.

tfw you realize Maya is closer to the age 19 than she is to the number 9. On that note, I love that little dog. She’s so heartwarming and I say that with the experience of raising both a chihuahua and a husky at the same time. Both are absolutely adorable but can be a huge handful. Love em to death.

As someone from Japan, I’ve always really appreciated how respectful you are to the people and culture Poods! every place has its ups and down so pay no mind to people being weird/negative about you moving there!! like you said, it’s not like this was some random, spontaneous decision; you know what you’re in for. Overall, just happy you’re there and hope you guys live it to the fullest! :D

the 'old' format would honestly be so fun and refreshing. I loved having something to look forward to like before. also !! super happy for you and your family, pewds~ have fun in japan and stay safe and happy ! <3

I'm excited to see all the stuff pewds is gonna do in Japan.

And when the Trash Taste bois return from the UK, finally have Pewds on Trash Taste

swear you guys have been GLOWING since arriving in japan. so excited for you, especially after everything that happened along the way. 

enjoy your lives in japan!! so hyped

I just wanted to say that I've been watching you on and off through the years since I was like 11. I'm 19 now.

Through all the ups and down of the channel, and through my own life's ups and downs. These last few years have been so goddamn hard on me, but seeing your growth and seeing you (seemingly) happy is a source of comfort for me. 

We don't know each other. I don't know what you go through in private. But I'm happy for you.

hiccups, adorable
i simply cant believe markilipier did this to you

The fact that pewds is still with Gfuel, Is just amazing.
I'm so happy for all four of you! The flight went well and now you get to live in the county you always wanted to! I love that I can be a part of this journey <3

I love how enthusiastic Japan has made Felix. After every sentence felix comments about a new series he'd love to try and create or launching a new gaming channel. The move has certainly given him a fresh mindset

We love a wholesome genuinely happy Pewdiepie. Wishing y’all the best.

I feel like he is a total different person after moving to Japan. It should've been really difficult for him to be stucked in UK. So happy for him <3
